msg: Hi, I need O+ blood urgently for my brother, can anyone help?
I have O+ blood available, contact me at +919812345001
Is there any hospital near Gurugram open 24 hours?
Medanta Gurugram and Paras Hospital are open 24x7 for emergencies.
Can someone tell me where I can get a COVID test report quickly?
Fortis Noida does same-day reports, I got mine there last week.
I need B negative blood for a surgery tomorrow, please respond soon.
AIIMS blood bank usually has B- available, call them ASAP.
Where can I book an appointment with a neurologist in Delhi?
You can try Max Hospital Saket or AIIMS, they have online booking.
My mother has a fever for 3 days, should I get a dengue test done?
Yes, better get tested. My cousin had similar symptoms and it was dengue.
Can anyone suggest a good child specialist near Noida Sector 62?
Dr. Sneha Patel at Fortis Noida is great, my nephew visits her.
I need A+ blood at Medanta Hospital urgently.
I can donate A+ blood, contact me at +919812345002
Is Max Hospital accepting emergency patients right now?
Yes, I visited last night, they were taking emergencies.
How much does an MRI cost at Fortis Noida?
It cost me around â‚¹5000 for a brain MRI last month.
Can I get a COVID booster dose at AIIMS Delhi?
Yes, I got mine last week, visit between 9 AM to 2 PM with ID.
Where can I get a blood sugar test done in Gurugram?
Medanta Lab and Paras Hospital offer walk-in tests, I used them last month.
